items.raw_string: Councillor, Kettering Borough Council, Municipal Offices, Bowling Green Road, Kettering, NN15 7QX. From April 2017 until further notice I receive a gross monthly payment of £449.50 for my role as councillor. This is a standard allowance unrelated to hours worked. My expected commitment is between 8 and 15 hours a month. (Updated 22 July 2015 and 29 June 2017)
